name: redivcli

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr), wne(c1, nat0))

body.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr)
-| wne(c1, nat0)
-| wi(wne(c1, nat0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr)
-| wne(c1, nat0)
-| wi(wne(c1, nat0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(wne(c1, nat0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr))
-| wcel(c0, cr)
-| wcel(c1, cr)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr)
-| wne(c1, nat0)
-| wcel(c0, cr)
-| wcel(c1, cr)

comment: Closure law for division of reals. (Contributed by NM, 9-May-1999.)
